Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 47th overall pick, by Toronto in 2019...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/2019, off Joshua Fortes (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/2019, off Bill Anderson (PIT)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/2019, hitting .333 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Injured on 6/4/2019 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2019, hitting .586 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Conference Championship with Toronto in 2019...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against Pittsburgh on 6/17/2020...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against New York on 4/1/2021...
Injured on 6/7/2021 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
